body: Background. Plastic pollution is a global crisis of increasing scale and severity. From the extraction of raw materials for production to the ultimate disposal of massive waste, plastics impact negatively several environmental domains, animal health and potentially human health, with possible global health and social implications. 1-3 These effects of plastics are poised to increase with the ...
readable_content: - January 8th, 2024: This article discusses the growing problem of plastic pollution and its impact on global health. It addresses the need for the global health community to prioritize this issue and take action to combat plastic pollution. The text provides insights into the environmental and health impacts of plastic pollution, emphasizing the interconnectedness of human, animal, and environmental health. The importance of adopting a One Health perspective to address the issue is also highlighted.
summary:
The article brings attention to the pressing problem of plastic pollution and emphasizes the need for action to combat its impact on global health. It underscores the interconnectedness of human, animal, and environmental health and highlights the importance of adopting a One Health perspective to address this issue. It conveys a sense of urgency and the need for concerted efforts to address the growing crisis of plastic pollution.
